visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Ensures the cutting tool is aligned correctly with the object.
examples: Knife positioned straight on a vegetable
Scissors aligned with a fabric edge

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Provides feedback on how deep the cut is progressing.
examples: Visible depth of a knife in a loaf of bread
Cutting through layers of a cake

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Monitors the smoothness and uniformity of the cut.
examples: Clean edges on sliced fruit
Even width of julienne vegetables

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Observes how the material separates during cutting.
examples: Peel separating from a fruit
Meat portions being divided

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Tracks the motion of the cutting tool to ensure precision.
examples: Straight cutting line on cardboard
Circular motion for pizza cutting

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Monitors how the object interacts with the cutting surface.
examples: Object slipping on a cutting board
Stable position during slicing

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Ensures the uncut parts of the object remain intact.
examples: Whole apple core intact after slicing
Bread loaf maintains shape after cutting

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Observes color variations to assess cutting progress.
examples: Inside color of an onion revealed after peeling layers
Inner layers of a cake after slicing

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Tracks the edges of the object to guide cutting paths.
examples: Following the edge of a crust on a pie
Tracing the outline of a stencil

visual_feedback_mechanisms.description: Detects any movement of the object during cutting.
examples: Object sliding on a cutting board
Rolling fruit while being sliced
